resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/156758</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>156758</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2473</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Eye on Israel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Auge auf Israel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Oeil sur l'Israel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Olho em Israel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Occhio sull'Israele</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μάτι στο Ισραήλ</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ojo en Israel</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">An interactive map of Israel which allows one to zoom in and focus on different areas/ towns and provides pictures , historical and cultural information and explanations of the place in qyestion.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">maps</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Israel</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine interaktive Karte von Israel, das ein zoom 
innen läßt und Fokus auf unterschiedlichen Bereiche Städten und 
liefert Abbildungen, historische und kulturelle Informationen und 
Erklärungen des Platzes im qyestion.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une carte interactive de l'Israel qui permet à 
on de bourdonner dedans et le foyer sur différentes villes de zones 
et fournit des images, l'information historique et culturelle et des 
explications de l'endroit dans le qyestion.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um mapa interativo de Israel que permite que uma 
zumba dentro e foco em cidades diferentes das áreas e fornece 
retratos, informação histórica e cultural e explanações do lugar 
no qyestion.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un programma interattivo dell'Israele che 
permette che l'uno zumi dentro e fuoco sulle città differenti di zone
e fornisce le immagini, le informazioni storiche e culturali e 
spiegazioni del posto in qyestion.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένας διαλογικός χάρτης του Ισραήλ που επιτρέπει σε 
ενός για να μεγεθύνει μέσα και να εστιάσει στις διαφορετικές 
περιοχές/τις πόλεις και παρέχει τις εικόνες, τις ιστορικές και 
πολιτιστικές πληροφορίες και τις εξηγήσεις της θέσης στο 
qyestion.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una correspondencia interactiva de Israel que 
permita que enfoque uno adentro y foco en diversas ciudades de las 
áreas y proporciona a cuadros, información histórica y cultural y 
las explicaciones del lugar en el qyestion.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Karten</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Israel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">cartes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">l'Israel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">mapas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Israel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">programmi</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'Israele</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">χάρτες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ισραήλ</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">correspondencias</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Israel</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <status>
            <source>statusValues</source>
            <value>final</value>
          </status>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>publisher</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
version:3.0
fn:Israel Ministry of Education
n:Israel Ministry of Education
org:Israel Ministry of Education
end:vcard</entity>
            <date>
              <dateTime>2009-02-20</dateTime>
            </date>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>

            <entry>ILMoE2473</entry>
          </identifier>
          <contribute>

            </role>

version:3.0
fn:Israel Ministry of Education
n:Israel Ministry of Education

          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>web page</value>
          </learningResourceType>
          <typicalAgeRange>
            <string language="en">8-18</string>
            <string language="x-t-lre">8-18</string>
          </typicalAgeRange>
          <context>
            <source>LRE.contextValues</source>
            <value>compulsory education</value>
          </context>
          <intendedEndUserRole>

          </intendedEndUserRole>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <cost>

          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Minsitry of Tourism, Israel</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <classification>
          <purpose>
            <source>purposeValues</source>
            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
            <source>
              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>
            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>540</id>
              <entry>
                <string language="en">geography</string>

        </classification>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
